channel.title: [508]The famous Maulzz-Scape! Original release
channel.description:
[U][B][COLOR="Red"][SIZE="4"]Maulzz-Scape 508[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][/U]
Well I got bored and I can't be botherd to add more things so be happy with what it has =) It usually dcs with about 100-150 ppl Lol
Current source - Maulzz-scape V1 Original Source - Pure3zscape ( Espeon )
[COLOR="Red"][CENTER][U]Features - [/U] All the pure3zscape features The Brand New shop Engine (::Shops) Fully working Edgeville bank ( Can Easily be converted to home ) Dragon Claws With Special Many Customs ( Few don't work did something to the item file ) A Custom Client with a picture at the back Full Godwars with correct drop system ( Also Killcount ) Prayer Alters Work Kbd With Dfs drops Kqueen 2 forms Lol Full Trading (Tabs have a bug) Full Pm system ( Don't save ) Well :;slayertower With npcs that have a good drop rate Added a few tele commands laz anti flooder or something Deleted all the jew Admin Crap Dunno if barrage works Havn't tried yet =) The dueling is not perfected It is compatible with HD/LD Clients ( I will just give LD custom )[/CENTER][/COLOR] And that is about it Thank you to all people who created the tutorials for this server it is very nice and has many features Which has been added think I did a bit of coding and error fixing but yh credits to the people who created tutorials.
Few Pictures :
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2myn19v.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/kboq3l.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/sdz6oj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/xkwq9t.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/dz6rdw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2u8i7tu.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/1p9ous.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/20jftr7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/m8ljb8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2ykf8fs.jpg[/img]
Downloads -
Source: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?2oz3yjnr250]http://www.mediafire.com/?2oz3yjnr250[/url]
Client: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?imnjefcitmm]http://www.mediafire.com/?imnjefcitmm[/url] <--- Client with customs and crap.
Before any of you say this is leeched or flame, I am the 2nd owner of this server with Dutch Maulzz. This was released on Run3 S3rv3r from the 3rd owner Adam by permission of Maulzz A.K.A Marninck. This server was a succesful one untill Maulzz A.K.A Marninck sold it as he got bored of RSPS and moved to Runescape, this server does still exist.

item.title: [508]The famous Maulzz-Scape! Original release
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

[COLOR=“Red”][SIZE=“4”]Maulzz-Scape 508[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Well I got bored and I can’t be botherd to add more things so be happy with what it has =)
It usually dcs with about 100-150 ppl Lol

Current source - Maulzz-scape V1
Original Source - Pure3zscape ( Espeon )

[COLOR=“Red”][CENTER]Features -
All the pure3zscape features
The Brand New shop Engine (::Shops)
Fully working Edgeville bank ( Can Easily be converted to home )
Dragon Claws With Special
Many Customs ( Few don’t work did something to the item file )
A Custom Client with a picture at the back
Full Godwars with correct drop system ( Also Killcount )
Prayer Alters Work
Kbd With Dfs drops
Kqueen 2 forms Lol
Full Trading (Tabs have a bug)
Full Pm system ( Don’t save )
Well :;slayertower With npcs that have a good drop rate
Added a few tele commands
laz anti flooder or something
Deleted all the jew Admin Crap
Dunno if barrage works Havn’t tried yet =)
The dueling is not perfected
It is compatible with HD/LD Clients ( I will just give LD custom )[/CENTER][/COLOR]
And that is about it Thank you to all people who created the tutorials for this server it is very nice and has many features Which has been added think I did a bit of coding and error fixing but yh credits to the people who created tutorials.

Few Pictures :


kboq3l.jpg765×504

sdz6oj.jpg764×500

xkwq9t.jpg757×499






2ykf8fs.jpg759×493

Downloads -

Source:
http://www.mediafire.com/?2oz3yjnr250

Client:
http://www.mediafire.com/?imnjefcitmm <— Client with customs and crap.

Before any of you say this is leeched or flame, I am the 2nd owner of this server with Dutch Maulzz. This was released on Run3 S3rv3r from the 3rd owner Adam by permission of Maulzz A.K.A Marninck. This server was a succesful one untill Maulzz A.K.A Marninck sold it as he got bored of RSPS and moved to Runescape, this server does still exist.
